name: Aganorsa Leaf - Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Connecticut - Toro
brand: Aganorsa Leaf, Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Connecticut
additionalNotes: This medium-strength cigar offers a sweet and creamy profile that will delight your palate. Its Ecuadorian Connecticut Shade wrapper covers a Nicaraguan binder and filler. The Casa Fernandez Aganorsa Connecticut Toro is handmade in Nicaragua.Â this mild yet flavorful cigar boasts notes of cedar and chocolate while still maintaining the smooth creamy lusciousness of the typical Connecticut cigar.
